quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词"cognitive"（认知的）或词根"cogitare"（思考）误将"cogito"理解为普通"思考"或"认知"，忽略其哲学上"自我意识的思考"的特定含义
quiz_item.sentence: Descartes' famous assertion "Cogito, ergo sum" ("I think, therefore I am") relies on the concept of **cogito**, which denotes the act of self-aware thought that confirms one's existence.

option.definition: （哲学上的）我思；自我意识的思考
认知的；有关认知过程的
